name: Dark Side Of The Noon
description:
JamDNA #4 entry game

Controls: Arrow keys to move & Jump. "X" to Shout.

Collect all the hidden diamond crystals! Whenever you are close to a diamond crystal, your heartbeat increases (The faster your heart beats, the closer to a crystal you are). You have to shout (press X) for a crystal to appear & then collect  it.

Criteria #1: Nighttime  (Game takes place at midnight, also known as the "Dark Side Of The Noon")

Criteria #2: Eerie (The game's atmosphere encourages exploration in this mysterious & strange place)

Criteria #3: Ambient Piano (The main theme is an ambient piano track which is fully copossed by ARTIOS exclousively for this jam's game)

Criteria #4: Vibrant (In an almost static world your heart pulses whenever you are close to something precious)

All game assets have been created during this game jam's time period  by Rubik's Curse team members (Programming scripts, graphics, music & sound effects)

ARTIOS: MUSIC & SFX

DESBOW: PROGRAMMING

SNAG: GRAPHICS

 "Follow your heart"
